price: 40. Sesungguhnya Kami-lah yang mewarisi bumi*(503) dan semua yang ada di atasnya, dan hanya kepada Kami mereka dikembalikan.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: *503). Setelah seluruh alam ini hancur, maka hanya Allah yang kekal.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
